title: MongoDB security advisory (AV25-380)
description: On June 26, 2025, MongoDB published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: MongoDB Server v6.0  versions prior to 6.0.21
MongoDB Server v7.0  versions prior to 7.0.17
MongoDB Server v8.0  versions prior to 8.0.5
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
